016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.HashMap;
021import java.util.Map;
022import java.util.Map.Entry;
023
024/**
025 * A functional group of a fatty acid, it can contain nested functional groups.
026 *
027 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
028 * @author Nils Hoffmann
029 */
030public class FunctionalGroup {
031
032    protected String name;
033    protected int position = -1;
034    protected int count;
035    protected String stereochemistry;
036    protected String ringStereo;
037    protected DoubleBonds doubleBonds;
038    protected boolean atomic;
039    protected ElementTable elements;
040    protected HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> functionalGroups;
041    protected KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups;
042    protected int numAtomsAndBonds;
043
044    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
045        this(_name, -1, 1, null, false, "", null, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
046    }
047
048    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
049        this(_name, _position, _count, null, false, "", null, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
050    }
051
052    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, boolean _is_atomic, String _stereochemistry, ElementTable _elements, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
053        this(_name, _position, _count, _double_bonds, _is_atomic, _stereochemistry, _elements, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
054    }
055
056    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, boolean _is_atomic, String _stereochemistry, ElementTable _elements, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups, int _numAtomsAndBonds) {
057        this(_name, _position, _count, _double_bonds, _is_atomic, _stereochemistry, _elements, null, knownFunctionalGroups, _numAtomsAndBonds);
058    }
059
060    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, boolean _is_atomic, String _stereochemistry, ElementTable _elements, HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> _functional_groups, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
061        this(_name, _position, _count, _double_bonds, _is_atomic, _stereochemistry, _elements, _functional_groups, knownFunctionalGroups, 0);
062    }
063
064    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, boolean _is_atomic, String _stereochemistry, ElementTable _elements, HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> _functional_groups, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups, int _numAtomsAndBonds) {
065        name = _name;
066        position = _position;
067        count = _count;
068        numAtomsAndBonds = _numAtomsAndBonds;
069        stereochemistry = _stereochemistry;
070        ringStereo = "";
071        doubleBonds = (_double_bonds != null) ? _double_bonds : new DoubleBonds(0);
072        atomic = _is_atomic;
073        elements = (_elements != null) ? _elements : new ElementTable();
074        functionalGroups = (_functional_groups != null) ? _functional_groups : (new HashMap<>());
075        this.knownFunctionalGroups = knownFunctionalGroups;
076    }
077
078    public FunctionalGroup copy() {
079        DoubleBonds db = doubleBonds.copy();
080        HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> fg = new HashMap<>();
081        functionalGroups.entrySet().stream().map(kv -> {
082            fg.put(kv.getKey(), new ArrayList<>());
083            return kv;
084        }).forEachOrdered(kv -> {
085            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
086                fg.get(kv.getKey()).add(func_group.copy());
087            });
088        });
089        ElementTable e = new ElementTable();
090        elements.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
091            e.put(kv.getKey(), kv.getValue());
092        });
093
094        FunctionalGroup func_group_new = new FunctionalGroup(name, position, count, db, atomic, stereochemistry, e, fg, knownFunctionalGroups, numAtomsAndBonds);
095        func_group_new.ringStereo = ringStereo;
096        return func_group_new;
097    }
098
099    public void setName(String name) {
100        this.name = name;
101    }
102
103    public String getName() {
104        return this.name;
105    }
106
107    public void setPosition(int position) {
108        this.position = position;
109    }
110
111    public int getPosition() {
112        return this.position;
113    }
114
115    public void setCount(int count) {
116        this.count = count;
117    }
118
119    public int getCount() {
120        return this.count;
121    }
122
123    @JsonIgnore
124    public String getStereochemistry() {
125        return stereochemistry;
126    }
127
128    public void setStereochemistry(String stereochemistry) {
129        this.stereochemistry = stereochemistry;
130    }
131
132    @JsonIgnore
133    public String getRingStereo() {
134        return ringStereo;
135    }
136
137    public void setRingStereo(String ringStereo) {
138        this.ringStereo = ringStereo;
139    }
140
141    public DoubleBonds getDoubleBonds() {
142        return this.doubleBonds;
143    }
144
145    public void setDoubleBonds(DoubleBonds doubleBonds) {
146        this.doubleBonds = doubleBonds;
147    }
148
149    public void setAtomic(boolean atomic) {
150        this.atomic = atomic;
151    }
152
153    @JsonIgnore
154    public boolean isAtomic() {
155        return this.atomic;
156    }
157
158    @JsonIgnore
159    public ElementTable getElements() {
160        return this.elements;
161    }
162
163    public void setElements(ElementTable elements) {
164        this.elements = elements;
165    }
166
167    @JsonIgnore
168    public ElementTable computeAndCopyElements() {
169        computeElements();
170        ElementTable _elements = elements.copy();
171        _elements.add(getFunctionalGroupElements());
172        return _elements;
173    }
174
175    public void shiftPositions(int shift) {
176        position += shift;
177        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
178            kv.getValue().forEach(fg -> {
179                fg.shiftPositions(shift);
180            });
181        });
182    }
183
184    /**
185     * Return the total count for the given functional group name, or 0.
186     * @param functionalGroup the functional group name.
187     * @return the total count
188     */
189    public Integer getTotalFunctionalGroupCount(String functionalGroup) {
190        if ("[X]".equals(functionalGroup)) {
191            return 0;
192        } else if (functionalGroups.containsKey(functionalGroup)) {
193            return functionalGroups.get(functionalGroup).stream().map(fg -> fg.getCount()).reduce(0, Integer::sum);
194        } else {
195            return 0;
196        }
197    }
198
199    /**
200     * Returns a copy of the internally used functional groups map, with the virtual [X] group for regular LCBs removed.
201     * @return a copy of the internal functional groups
202     * @see #getFunctionalGroupsInternal() to obtain the internal datastructure by reference.
203     */
204    public Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> getFunctionalGroups() {
205        Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> mapCopy = new HashMap<>(functionalGroups);
206        mapCopy.remove("[X]");
207        return mapCopy;
208    }
209    
210    /**
211     * Returns the internal representation of the functional groups, including the virtual [X] group for regular LCBs.
212     * @return the internal datastructure by reference.
213     */
214    @JsonIgnore
215    public Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> getFunctionalGroupsInternal() {
216        return functionalGroups;
217    }
218
219    /**
220     * Set the internal functional groups.
221     * @param functionalGroups the functional groups to set
222     */
223    public void setFunctionalGroups(HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> functionalGroups) {
224        this.functionalGroups = functionalGroups;
225    }
226
227    @JsonIgnore
228    public ElementTable getFunctionalGroupElements() {
229        ElementTable _elements = new ElementTable();
230
231        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
232            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
233                _elements.add(func_group.computeAndCopyElements(), func_group.count);
234            });
235        });
236
237        return _elements;
238    }
239
240    public void computeElements() {
241        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
242            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
243                func_group.computeElements();
244            });
245        });
246    }
247
248    public String toString(LipidLevel level) {
249        String fg_string = "";
250        if (LipidLevel.isLevel(level, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.level)) {
251            if ('0' <= name.charAt(0) && name.charAt(0) <= '9') {
252                fg_string = (position > -1) ? (Integer.toString(position) + ringStereo + "(" + name + ")") : name;
253            } else {
254                fg_string = (position > -1) ? (Integer.toString(position) + ringStereo + name) : name;
255            }
256        } else {
257            fg_string = (count > 1) ? ("(" + name + ")" + Integer.toString(count)) : name;
258        }
259        if (stereochemistry.length() > 0 && level == LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE) {
260            fg_string += "[" + stereochemistry + "]";
261        }
262
263        return fg_string;
264    }
265
266    public int getNDoubleBonds() throws ConstraintViolationException {
267        int db = count * doubleBonds.getNumDoubleBonds();
268        for (Entry<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> kv : functionalGroups.entrySet()) {
269            for (FunctionalGroup func_group : kv.getValue()) {
270                db += func_group.getNDoubleBonds();
271            }
272        }
273
274        return db;
275    }
276
277    public void addPosition(int pos) {
278        position += (position >= pos) ? 1 : 0;
279
280        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
281            kv.getValue().forEach(fg -> {
282                fg.addPosition(pos);
283            });
284        });
285    }
286
287}
